author: Findaruil

posts.author: Findaruil
posts.content:
Hello people!

Having requested a build I thought I'd also share one of my ideas. When seeing the Purple Dragon Knight class I thought I'd try for a summoner build. Here it is, available for your knowladgeable comments!

The Riding Avatar of Death - Bard 17 Pale Master 18 Purple Dragon Knight 5

Human, True Neutral

Str 16 Dex 8 Con 14 Wis 8 Int 12 Cha 16

Initial Skillset: Concentration 4 Intimidate 1 Listen 2 Perform 4 Persuade 1 Ride 2 Spot 2 Tumble 2 UMD 1
Final Skillset: same as above except: Concentration 43 Spellcraft 43 Tumble 40 UMD 30

Leveling
Lvl 1-10 Bard 10 (Lingering Song, Mounted Combat, Exotic Weapon Proficiency, Str+1, Weapon Focus: Scythe, Str+1, Power Attack)
Lvl 11-15 Purple Dragon Knight 5 (Str+1, Cleave, Improved Critical: Scythe)
Lvl 16-20 Pale Master 5 (Str+1, Great Cleave, Str+1)
Lvl 21-26 Bard 16 (Epic Weapon Focus: Scythe, Str+1, Great Str I)
Lvl 27-39 Pale Master 18 (Overwhelming Critical, Str+1, Great STrength II, Str+1, Devastating Critical, Epic Energy Resistance I, Str+1, Epic Spell: Epic Warding, Epic Spell: Hellball, Epic Spell: Epic Mage Armor)
Lvl 40 Bard 17 (Str+1)

Final Strength 28

Optional change: trade Epic Mage Armor for Extend Spell for longer buffs.

Forgive me if I don't post the complete levelling layout and stats. I'll try and do this as soon as possible, but I was eager to know what you think of her (yes, of course, death is a woman! :) )
